verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician <WH5329> upon Shushaneduth, <WH7802> Michtam <WH4387> of David, <WH1732> to teach; <WH3925> when he strove <WH5327> with Aramnaharaim <WH763> and with Aramzobah, <WH760> when Joab <WH3097> returned, <WH7725> and smote <WH5221> of Edom <WH123> in the valley <WH1516> of salt <WH4417> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> thousand. <WH505> O God, <WH430> you have cast <WH2186> us off, you have scattered <WH6555> us, you have been displeased; <WH599> O turn <WH7725> yourself to us again. <WH7725>
You have made the earth <WH776> to tremble; <WH7493> you have broken <WH6480> it: heal <WH7495> the breaches <WH7667> thereof; for it shakes. <WH4131>
You have showed your people <WH5971> hard <WH7186> things: you have made us to drink <WH8248> the wine <WH3196> of astonishment. <WH8653>
You have given <WH5414> a banner <WH5251> to them that fear <WH3373> you, that it may be displayed <WH5127> because <WH6440> of the truth. <WH7189> Selah. <WH5542>
That your beloved <WH3039> may be delivered; <WH2502> save <WH3467> with your right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> and hear <WH6030> me.
God <WH430> has spoken <WH1696> in his holiness; <WH6944> I will rejoice, <WH5937> I will divide <WH2505> Shechem, <WH7927> and mete <WH4058> out the valley <WH6010> of Succoth. <WH5523>
Gilead <WH1568> is mine, and Manasseh <WH4519> is mine; Ephraim <WH669> also is the strength <WH4581> of my head; <WH7218> Judah <WH3063> is my lawgiver; <WH2710>
Moab <WH4124> is my wash pot; <WH5518> <WH7366> over <WH5921> Edom <WH123> will I cast <WH7993> out my shoe: <WH5275> Philistia, <WH6429> triumph <WH7321> you because <WH5921> of me.
Who <WH4310> will bring <WH2986> me into the strong <WH4692> city? <WH5892> who <WH4310> will lead <WH5148> me into <WH5704> Edom? <WH123>
Will not you, O God, <WH430> which had cast <WH2186> us off? and you, O God, <WH430> which did not go <WH3318> out with our armies? <WH6635>
Give <WH3051> us help <WH5833> from trouble: <WH6862> for vain <WH7723> is the help <WH8668> of man. <WH120>
Through God <WH430> we shall do <WH6213> valiantly: <WH2428> for he it is that shall tread <WH947> down our enemies. <WH6862>
